dcterms:creator: A. E. Johnson
T. J. Pollard
S. J. Berkowitz
dcterms:description: MIMIC-CXR is the largest openly available chest X-ray image dataset, inclusive of data from 65,379 patients between 2011 and 2016. It comprises 377,100 chest X-ray images from different views and 227,835 semi-structured free-text radiology reports, focusing on findings sections of the reports.
dcterms:title: MIMIC-CXR
